name: LEGO Batman: The Videogame

files.file2: N/A:Please select the patch from GOG

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: N/A:Please select the patch from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/LEGO Batman/LEGOBatman.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /sp- /norestart /nogui
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /sp- /verysilent /norestart /suppressmsgboxes /nogui
    executable: $file2
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: ole32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
